name: EmersonEm
0:
”Alexa, launch Emerson Em.”
”Alexa, ask Emerson Em where the library is.”
”Alexa, ask Emerson Em whats happening today.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: emerson em
des:
Emerson Em answers some of the most frequently asked questions at Emerson College. Need campus directions? Need to know what events are happening this weekend? It’s easy. Just enable the Emerson Em Skill on your Alexa app. Then, all you need to say is "Alexa, Launch Emerson Em" and Alexa will be happy to respond. Emerson Em is here to help!
To learn the full schedule, you can take a look at our Events Calendar-https://www.emerson.edu/news-events/events-calendar
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
